bibl.title: Gospel Fragments: The 'Unknown Gospel' on Papyrus Egerton 2 (T.N.); - Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 840 (M.J.Kr.); - Other Gospel Fragments (Th.J.Kr.). With an Introduction by Th.J.Kr. (Oxford Early Christian Gospel Texts.)
bibl.note: Series Preface (Andrew GREGORY and Christopher TUCKETT). - Preface (Th.J.Kr., M.Kr. and T.N.). - Introduction (Th.J.Kr.). - I. The 'Unknown Gospel' on Papyrus Egerton 2 (+ Papyrus Cologne 255) [P. Egerton 2 + P. Köln VI, 255 (= van Haelst 586; LDAB 4736)] (T.N.). - II. Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 840 [P. Oxy. V, 840 (= van Haelst 585; LDAB 5831)] (M.J.Kr.). - III. Other Gospel Fragments (Th.J.Kr.): 1. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 2325 [= van Haelst 589; LDAB 5462]: The 'Fayûm Fragment'; - 2. P. Berol. Inv. 11710 [= van Haelst 591; LDAB 6211]; - 3. P. Cair. Inv. 10735 [= van Haelst 588; LDAB 6414]; - 4. P. Merton II, 51 [= van Haelst 1147; LDAB 5621]; - 5. P. Oxy. X, 1224 [= van Haelst 587; LDAB 5727]. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: NICKLAS Tobias, Michael J. KRUGER and Thomas J. KRAUS, Gospel Fragments: The 'Unknown Gospel' on Papyrus Egerton 2 (T.N.); - Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 840 (M.J.Kr.); - Other Gospel Fragments (Th.J.Kr.). With an Introduction by Th.J.Kr. (Oxford Early Christian Gospel Texts.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2009, 8°, xx-304 pp., 15 pll. ISBN 978-0-19-920815-9. £87.

Series Preface (Andrew GREGORY and Christopher TUCKETT). - Preface (Th.J.Kr., M.Kr. and T.N.). - Introduction (Th.J.Kr.). - I. The 'Unknown Gospel' on Papyrus Egerton 2 (+ Papyrus Cologne 255) [P. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 2325 [= van Haelst 589; LDAB 5462]: The 'Fayûm Fragment'; - 2. P. Berol. Inv. 11710 [= van Haelst 591; LDAB 6211]; - 3. P. Cair. Inv. 10735 [= van Haelst 588; LDAB 6414]; - 4. P. Merton II, 51 [= van Haelst 1147; LDAB 5621]; - 5. P. Oxy. X, 1224 [= van Haelst 587; LDAB 5727]. - Indexes.
